org.apache.zookeeper.data.ACL

    Package Description
    org.apache.zookeeper  

    • Uses of ACL in org.apache.zookeeper

      Fields in org.apache.zookeeper with type parameters of type ACL 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<ACL> ZooDefs.Ids.CREATOR_ALL_ACL
      This ACL gives the creators authentication id's all permissions.
      static java.util.ArrayList<ACL> ZooDefs.Ids.OPEN_ACL_UNSAFE
      This is a completely open ACL .
      static java.util.ArrayList<ACL> ZooDefs.Ids.READ_ACL_UNSAFE
      This ACL gives the world the ability to read.
      Methods in org.apache.zookeeper that return types with arguments of type ACL 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<ACL> ZooKeeper.getACL(java.lang.String path, Stat stat)
      Return the ACL and stat of the node of the given path.
